name: Bee (Sebastian.Todeasa)
description:
Because of those darn humans, pollution, pesticides, and global warming have caused the near extinction of BEES. Now you are the ONLY ONE left. Save the world by pollinating and spreading flowers around the entire world to give the humans a second chance.

How to Play:

Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move and SHIFT to fly faster.

Hold SPACE on a flower to pollinate it, increasing its HEALTH. If flowers are close to dying, they will appear WITHERED and they can't reproduce.

Scare away RABBITS that want to eat the flowers. They will rapidly hurt nearby flowers.
Your STAMINA is shown as a bar on the screen, and will decrease over time. To replenish, hold SPACE at your HIVE. If you run out of stamina or flowers, you die.

Score is shown in the top left corner, and high score is shown at the top right.
GOOD LUCK!

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2019
